name: You're Fired (itch)
description:
Every one is home due to the quarantine, and you have been told to pack up and get out in 5 minutes. Pack as much as you can steal into your briefcase! Collect all 5 golden items hidden in the level for a $1000 score bonus. Try to get all the achievements!

This game was made from Friday, May 1st to Sunday, May 3rd 2020 for the #NdabJam THEME: "Pack" or "انضب" (i.e. انضب بالبيت)

Controls:

Move with WASD, Jump with SPACE, and crouch with CTRL. Steal items with LEFT CLICK. Open the briefcase with E.

With the briefcase open: Click and drag items in the briefcase with LEFT CLICK. Delete selected item with RIGHT CLICK. Rotate selected item with R. Close the briefcase with E

A Regular Business Game

Programming

Douglas Winegarden

Tristan Frazier

3D Assets

Zachary Tenorio

Sound and Music

Jake Kargl
